    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        The initialize method is used to set up the machine selection combo box and associated functionality. It sets the supplySBC to not animated, textConclusionsLbl to not visible, and loads all machines from the datastore. It populates the machine selection combo box with machines that match the reportRegion of the current user and sets up a listener to update data when a new machine is selected. It also sets the prevPageBtn and nextPageBtn to not visible.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface IScreen

      • setReport

        public static void setReport​(java.lang.String year,
                             java.lang.String month,
                             java.lang.String region)
        The setReport method is used to set the report year, month and region for the current report.
        Parameters:
        year - the year of the report
        month - the month of the report
        region - the region of the report

      • recieveDataFromServer

        public static void recieveDataFromServer​(SupplyReportEntity report)
        This method receives data from a server and updates the reportDetails and RecievedData fields.
        Parameters:
        report - The SupplyReportEntity object containing the report data received from the server.

        Parameters:
        obj - The object containing the answer received from the server.

      • nextPageView

        void nextPageView​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method is the event handler for the "next page" button. It updates the indices for the portion of the itemsArray to be displayed in the bar chart, and calls the setupBarChart method to update the chart.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent object generated when the button is clicked.

      • prevPageView

        void prevPageView​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method is the event handler for the "previous page" button. It updates the indices for the portion of the itemsArray to be displayed in the bar chart, and calls the setupBarChart method to update the chart.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent object generated when the button is clicked.
